reviewText: To anyone interested in critically looking at individuals who claim to have psychic powers this DVD is a gold mine. Watching a master performer demonstrate his craft is amazing in itself!!

THE master !
Amazing, fun, interesting, fascinating.... a great lesson gived with humour

I loved this video from beginning to end

What more can you say...It's Kreskin.

If you love him like i do everything he does is wonderful.

He is a great entertainer...Period!

A rare and totally enjoyable opportunity to see one of the masters at work.

You see the Amazing one do what he does best. He absolutely charms (most important) and then amazes his audience.

I am a little sad he actually tips some of the secrets and techniques...it takes away from the intrigue of not knowing.

Buy this DVD and be prepared to be entertained.
